page.title: J.P. Morgan Chase Profit Falls 13 Percent
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - J.P. Morgan Chase Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JPM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JPM.N</A> posted lower third-quarter earnings on Wednesday, missing analyst expectations, as costs from its July merger with Bank One Corp. and anemic fixed-income trading revenue hurt profits.
